questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hey there!

questions.question: How are you?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?

questions.question: What's up?
questions.answer: Not much, just chilling. How about you?

questions.question: How's your day going?
questions.answer: It's been good so far, thanks for asking. How about yours?

questions.question: What do you do for a living?
questions.answer: I work in [industry/occupation].

questions.question: Where are you from?
questions.answer: I'm originally from [place]. How about you?

questions.question: Tell me about your hobbies.
questions.answer: I love [hobbies/interests]. What about you?

questions.question: What's your favorite movie?
questions.answer: I really enjoy watching [favorite movie]. What about you?

questions.question: Do you have any pets?
questions.answer: Yes, I have a [type of pet].

questions.question: What's your favorite food?
questions.answer: I can never resist a good plate of [favorite food].

questions.question: How do you stay fit?
questions.answer: I like to [exercise/activity] to stay in shape. What about you?

questions.question: Any travel plans?
questions.answer: I'm thinking of visiting [destination]. How about you? Any travel plans?

questions.question: What's your favorite book?
questions.answer: I recently read [favorite book]. It was amazing. What about you?

questions.question: How's your family?
questions.answer: They're doing well, thanks. How about yours?

questions.question: What's your favorite music genre?
questions.answer: I'm really into [music genre]. How about you?

questions.question: How do you handle stress?
questions.answer: I usually [stress management technique]. What about you?

questions.question: Tell me about your best friend.
questions.answer: My best friend is [friend's name]. We've known each other for [number of years].

questions.question: What's your favorite season?
questions.answer: I love [favorite season] because of [reasons]. What about you?

questions.question: Do you believe in ghosts?
questions.answer: I'm not sure, but I find [ghost stories/paranormal] fascinating. What about you?

questions.question: How do you like to spend weekends?
questions.answer: I enjoy [weekend activities] on weekends. What about you?

questions.question: Tell me a joke.
questions.answer: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

questions.question: What's your favorite type of coffee?
questions.answer: I love a good cup of [favorite coffee type]. How about you?

questions.question: Do you prefer the beach or the mountains?
questions.answer: I'm more of a [beach/mountains] person. What about you?

questions.question: What's your go-to comfort food?
questions.answer: When I need comfort, I always go for [comfort food]. What's yours?

questions.question: What's the last concert or live event you attended?
questions.answer: I recently went to see [artist/band] in concert. It was an amazing experience. How about you?

questions.question: Any favorite quotes or mantras you live by?
questions.answer: I often remind myself of [favorite quote/mantra]. It keeps me motivated. What about you?

questions.question: What's the most adventurous thing you've ever done?
questions.answer: I once [adventurous experience]. It was thrilling! Have you had any adventurous experiences?

questions.question: Morning person or night owl?
questions.answer: I'm definitely a [morning/night] person. How about you?

questions.question: What's your favorite board game or video game?
questions.answer: I love playing [favorite game]. It's so much fun. What about you?

questions.question: Any favorite childhood memories?
questions.answer: One of my favorite childhood memories is [memory]. What about you? Any memorable moments from your childhood?

questions.question: What's your dream vacation destination?
questions.answer: I've always dreamed of visiting [dream destination]. How about you?

questions.question: Do you have a favorite app on your phone?
questions.answer: I can't live without [favorite app]. It's so useful. What about you?

questions.question: What's the most valuable lesson you've learned in life so far?
questions.answer: One of the most valuable lessons I've learned is [lesson]. How about you?

questions.question: How do you like to celebrate your birthday?
questions.answer: I usually celebrate my birthday by [birthday celebration tradition]. What about you?

questions.question: What's your favorite type of exercise?
questions.answer: I enjoy [favorite exercise]. It keeps me active and healthy. How about you?

questions.question: Any favorite podcasts you listen to?
questions.answer: I love listening to [favorite podcast]. It's so informative and entertaining. What about you?

questions.question: What's your favorite way to relax after a long day?
questions.answer: I like to unwind by [relaxation activity]. It helps me de-stress. What about you?

questions.question: What's the last movie or TV show you watched?
questions.answer: I recently watched [movie/TV show]. It was really good. Have you seen anything interesting lately?

questions.question: Tea or coffee?
questions.answer: I'm a [tea/coffee] person. How about you?

questions.question: What's your favorite type of cuisine?
questions.answer: I love [favorite cuisine]. The flavors are just amazing. What about you?

questions.question: How do you handle procrastination?
questions.answer: When I procrastinate, I usually [procrastination management strategy]. What about you?

questions.question: what is my name?
questions.answer: Rohit
